title: Lithium oxide material and method for manufacturing the same

inventors.name: マーティン  ポールセン イェンス
イェン  キーウ ローン
グレーム  アンムンゼン ブレット

events.title: First worldwide family litigation filed
description: "Global patent litigation dataset” by Darts-ip is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License.

events.title: Application filed by Ilion Technology Corp

classifications.description: Selection of substances as active materials, active masses, active liquids of inorganic oxides or hydroxides of manganese of mixed oxides or hydroxides containing manganese for inserting or intercalating light metals, e.g. LiMn2O4 or LiMn2OxFy
Complex oxides containing cobalt and at least one other metal element containing alkali metals, e.g. LiCoO2
Complex oxides containing nickel and at least one other metal element containing alkali metals, e.g. LiNiO2
Complex oxides containing nickel and at least one other metal element containing alkali metals, e.g. LiNiO2 containing manganese of the type (MnO2)n-, e.g. Li(NixMn1-x)O2 or Li(MyNixMn1-x-y)O2
Rocking-chair batteries, i.e. batteries with lithium insertion or intercalation in both electrodes; Lithium-ion batteries
Processes of manufacture in general
Methods of deposition of the material by coating on electrode collectors
Methods of deposition of the material by a doctor blade method, slip-casting or roller coating
Electrodes based on mixed oxides or hydroxides, or on mixtures of oxides or hydroxides, e.g. LiCoOx

Selection of substances as active materials, active masses, active liquids of inorganic oxides or hydroxides of nickel, cobalt or iron of mixed oxides or hydroxides containing iron, cobalt or nickel for inserting or intercalating light metals, e.g. LiNiO2, LiCoO2 or LiCoOxFy
Two-dimensional structures layered hydroxide-type, e.g. of the hydrotalcite-type
Solid solutions containing elements as dopants
Solid solutions containing elements as dopants one element only
Crystal-structural characteristics defined by measured X-ray, neutron or electron diffraction data by d-values or two theta-values, e.g. as X-ray diagram
Crystal-structural characteristics defined by measured X-ray, neutron or electron diffraction data by peak-intensities or a ratio thereof only
Crystal-structural characteristics defined by measured X-ray, neutron or electron diffraction data by a space-group or by other symmetry indications
Crystal-structural characteristics defined by measured X-ray, neutron or electron diffraction data by unit-cell parameters, atom positions or structure diagrams
Crystal-structural characteristics defined by measured data other than those specified in group C01P2002/70 by thermal analysis data, e.g. TGA, DTA, DSC
Electric properties
Physical characteristics, e.g. porosity, surface area
Organic electrolyte
Chemical precipitation
Energy storage using batteries

abstract: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a cathode material at low cost which discloses layers of the cathode material made from lithium and transition metal oxide, replaces a large amount of manganese and provides a competitive electrical chemical characteristic and a good thermal safe characteristic. SOLUTION: A single phase cathode material used in an electrical chemical battery is expressed by formula Li[LixCoyA1-x-y]O2. (In the formula, A expresses [MnzNi1-z], x expresses a value having a range of approximately 0.00-0.16, y expresses a value having a range of approximately 0.1-0.30, z expresses a value having a range of approximately 0.40-0.65, Lix is included in a transition metal layer of the structure; and/or the material includes a stratified R-3m crystal structure having a c/a ratio of approximately 1.012 or more.).
claims: 【請求項１】 下記の一般式で表される、電気化学的電池にて使用される単相カソード材料。 Ｌｉ［ＬｉｘＣｏｙＡ１−ｘ−ｙ］Ｏ２ （式中、Ａは［ＭｎｚＮｉ１−ｚ］を表し、ｘは約０．００〜約0．１６の範囲の数値を表し、ｙは約０．１〜約0．３０の範囲の数値を表し、ｚは約０．４０〜約0．６５の範囲の数値を表し、Ｌｉｘは前記構造体の遷移金属層に含まれる。）1. 【請求項３７】 前記前駆体酸化物を加熱する工程が酸素含有雰囲気で約５００℃〜約１０００℃の範囲の温度にて生じることを特徴とする請求項３５記載の方法。37. The method of claim 35, wherein the step of heating the precursor oxide occurs at a temperature ranging from about 500 ° C. to about 1000 ° C. in an oxygen containing atmosphere.

【請求項３８】 前記前駆体酸化物を加熱する工程が酸素含有雰囲気で約９００℃〜約１０００℃の範囲の温度にて生じることを特徴とする請求項３５記載の方法。38. The method of claim 35, wherein the step of heating the precursor oxide occurs in an oxygen containing atmosphere at a temperature ranging from about 900 ° C. to about 1000 ° C.
【請求項３９】 高温における前記反応が少なくとも１２時間実施される請求項３５記載の方法。39. The reaction at elevated temperatures wherein at least one  The method of claim 35, wherein the method is performed for 2 hours.
